name: Samsung 55-Inch 4K Smart TV
description: Experience stunning 4K UHD resolution with HDR support. Smart TV features with built-in apps and voice control.

name: LG 260L Frost Free Refrigerator
description: Double door refrigerator with frost-free technology. Energy efficient with smart inverter compressor.

name: Sony Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation. 30-hour battery life with quick charging.

name: Whirlpool 7.5 Kg Washing Machine
description: Fully automatic top load washing machine with multiple wash programs. Energy and water efficient.

name: Dell Inspiron 15 Laptop
description: Intel Core i5 11th Gen, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD. 15.6-inch FHD display perfect for work and entertainment.

name: Canon EOS 1500D DSLR Camera
description: 24.1MP DSLR with 18-55mm lens. Wi-Fi enabled for easy photo sharing. Perfect for beginners.

name: Havells 1.5 Ton Split AC
description: 3-star rated inverter AC with copper condenser. Energy efficient with turbo cooling mode.

name: Apple iPhone 14
description: 128GB storage, A15 Bionic chip. Advanced dual-camera system with cinematic mode.

name: Blue Star Water Purifier RO+UV
description: 8-stage purification with RO+UV technology. 7L storage capacity with mineral retention.
